FakeAmazonAPI
Class Terminal

java.lang.Object
  FakeAmazonAPI.Terminal

public class Terminal
extends java.lang.Object

A client connect to the terminal to interact with the shop. Only 1 instance of the terminal can be created. This is a way to avoid a threading problem. Typically, this is acting as a controller.

@author jeremiesimon<\p>
